name: TELEGRAM MANAGEMENT x MUSIC BOT
description: A Powerful  Telegram group management and music bot with addtional features.

AUTO_LEAVING_ASSISTANT.description: If you want your assistant to leave all chats automatically after some time.

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Get a mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com . You can leave it blank if you want , bot will use LG's database for you.

MUSIC_BOT_NAME.description: A name for your Music Bot. Please don't use ascii characters[example : LG MUSIC BOT]

OWNER_ID.description: The user id(s) of user(s) whom you would like to add as a OWNER. Multiple values shall be seperated with a space.

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: Paste your support channel link note: Must start with https://t.me/

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Paste your support Group link note: Must start with https://t.me/

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram String Session. One Assistant is Compulsory . Get it in @LG_StringSessionBot.

STRING_SESSION2.description: A Pyrogram String Session. One Assistant is Compulsory . Get it in @LG_StringSessionBot.

STRING_SESSION3.description: A Pyrogram String Session. One Assistant is Compulsory . Get it in @LG_StringSessionBot.

STRING_SESSION4.description: A Pyrogram String Session. One Assistant is Compulsory . Get it in @LG_StringSessionBot.

STRING_SESSION5.description: A Pyrogram String Session. One Assistant is Compulsory . Get it in @LG_StringSessionBot.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku account's API key . get in it https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Your heroku app/bot's name . Enter above giving Name

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Your Log Group ID, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights!. Use only Group. Please don't use Channel ID.

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: If you dont know this, Leave as it is
